## CookieService.getCookie() method

Retrieves a single cookie by it's name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCookie(name: string, skipSerialization?: boolean): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Identification of the Cookie |
|  skipSerialization | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether skip deserialization from json string |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`

The Cookie's value
